data.name: lblBackgroundImageLeft.Help
data.value:
Specifies the margin between the animation window and the left border of the background image.
Default: 0

data.name: lblBackgroundImagePath.Help
data.value:
Specifies the path of an image displayed as the background image.
Default: -

data.name: lblBackgroundImageTop.Help
data.value:
Specifies the margin between the animation window and the upper border of the background image.
Default: 0

data.name: lblFlashAlternative.Help
data.value:
Specifies an alternative content, which will be displayed if Flash is not installed or supported.
Default: -

The alternative content will be displayed in the field provided for the Flash Player. The extent of this field has been defined in the settings "Flash Player Width" and "Flash Player Height". Ensure that the alternative content can be displayed within the field defined with the Flash Player! If you do not define any alternative content, the standard Flash Player message will be displayed.

The alternative content will also be picked up by search engines, making it a great tool for creating search-engine-friendly content!

data.name: lblBackgroundColor.Help
data.value:
Specifies the background color of the animation.
Default: #ffffff

data.name: lblFlashBgImage.Help
data.value:
Specifies whether an image should appear as background image.
Default: not checked

data.name: lblBackgroundTransparent.Help
data.value: Specifies that the Carousel is displayed with a transparent background. "Background Color" and "Background Image" play no role in this case.

data.name: lblFlashHeight.Help
data.value:
Specifies the height of the animation area.
Default: 350

data.name: lblFlashLeft.Help
data.value:
Specifies the margin between the animation window and the left border of the module.
Default: 0

data.name: lblFlashMenu.Help
data.value:
Specifies what type of menu appears when the user Right-clicks the animation area.
Default: not checked

Checked: Shows the full menu, which gives the user several options to enhance or control playback.

Not Checked: Shows a menu that contains only the About option and the Settings option.

data.name: lblFlashQuality.Help
data.value:
Specifies the animation's quality level.
Default: High

High: Favors quality of animation. (recommended)
Medium: Favors execution speed and does not take quality of animation into account unless it's possible.
Low: Favors execution speed.

data.name: lblFlashScale.Help
data.value:
Specifies whether the animation will be scaled automatically when it is displayed.
Default: NoScale

No Scale: This option sets the animation's scale mode property to not allow scaling. (recommended)

Show All: This option displays the entire area of the animation keeping its original size. This option may cause scroll bars to appear.

No Border: This option automatically resizes the animation area in terms of the available display space while conserving the original proportions.

Exact Fit: This option resizes the animation area in terms of the defined space. The image may be distorted.

data.name: lblFlashTop.Help
data.value:
Specifies the margin between the animation window and the upper border of the module.
Default: 0

data.name: lblFlashWidth.Help
data.value:
Specifies the width of the animation area.
Default: 600

data.name: lblImageContent1.Help
data.value:
Specifies the text to be shown in Textfield1. Any details with regard to the presentation of the text can be defined in the area "Dynamic Textfields".

Note: If you have checked option "HTML" under "Dynamic Textfields" you can make use of the following HTML tags for designing your text: Anchor: <a ...>
Bold: <b>
Font: <font ...>
Italic: <i>
Paragraph: <p ...>
Underline: <u>
Break: <br>
Image: <img ...>
List Item: <li>

data.name: lblImageContent2.Help
data.value:
Specifies the text to be shown in Textfield2. Any details with regard to the presentation of the text can be defined in the area "Dynamic Textfields".

Note: If you have checked option "HTML" under "Dynamic Textfields" you can make use of the following HTML tags for designing your text: Anchor: <a ...>
Bold: <b>
Font: <font ...>
Italic: <i>
Paragraph: <p ...>
Underline: <u>
Break: <br>
Image: <img ...>
List Item: <li>

data.name: lblImageLink.Help
data.value:
Specifies the link to the page to be loaded when clicking on the image.

Target:
_blank : The page will be shown in a new browser window.
_self: The page will be shown in the Carousel window.
_parent: The page will be shown in the parent page.
_top: The page will be shown in the topmost frame.

data.name: lblImagePath.Help
data.value: Specifies the path of the image displayed in the Carousel.

data.name: lblNavigationButtonsAlpha.Help
data.value:
Specifies the alpha transparency value of the buttons.
Default: 75

data.name: lblNavigationButtonsColor.Help
data.value:
Specifies the color of the buttons.
Default: #ff0000

data.name: lblNavigationButtonsLeft.Help
data.value:
Specifies the margin between the animation window and the left border of the buttons.
Default: 0

data.name: lblNavigationButtonsTop.Help
data.value:
Specifies the margin between the animation window and the upper border of the buttons.
Default: 0

data.name: lblNavigationInitialRotation.Help
data.value:
Specifies how long the Carousel should rotate initially. Works only in combination with the navigation buttons.
Default: 0

data.name: lblNavigationType.Help
data.value:
Specifies the rotation options of the Carousel.
Default: Auto

Auto: The Carousel rotates automatically.
Buttons: Navigation buttons are displayed by which the Carousel rotation can be directed to run clockwise or counter-clockwise.
Custom: The navigation buttons can be positioned anywhere.

data.name: lblReflectionAlpha.Help
data.value:
Specifies the alpha transparency value of the reflection.
Default: 50

data.name: lblReflectionDistance.Help
data.value:
Specifies the distance the reflection starts from the bottom of the image.
Default: 0

data.name: lblReflectionHeight.Help
data.value:
Specifies the height of the reflection in percent.
Default: 50

data.name: lblReflectionVisible.Help
data.value:
Specifies if a reflection should be visible.
Default: checked

data.name: messageDeleteAllImages.Text
data.value: Are You Sure You Wish To Delete All Images?

data.name: messageDeleteImage.Text
data.value: Are You Sure You Wish To Delete This Image?

data.name: lblNavigationButtonLeftPath.Help
data.value:
Specifies the path of an image displayed as the left button.
Default: -
Sample: cmdLeft.png

This setting allows you to replace the standard 3D Carousel left navigation button with your own button image.

data.name: lblNavigationButtonRightPath.Help
data.value:
Specifies the path of an image displayed as the right button.
Default: -
Sample: cmdRight.png

This setting allows you to replace the standard 3D Carousel right navigation button with your own button image.

data.name: lblToolTipAlign.Help
data.value:
Specifies the horizontal alignment of the text.
Default: left

data.name: lblToolTipAntiAliasing.Help
data.value:
Specifies that the font faces should be rendered more legible
Default: not checked

The setting enables high quality rendering and should be used by preference when using small fonts. (< 10 px)

HTML: When selecting anti-aliasing, the standard font (Verdana) will be used automatically! Please don’t define any fonts in HTML! If you do, the text will not be displayed!

<font color='#ffffff' face='Arial'>Text</font> invalid!
<font color='#ffffff'>Text</font> vaild!

data.name: lblToolTipBgColor.Help
data.value:
Specifies the background color of the tooltip.
Default: -

data.name: lblToolTipBold.Help
data.value:
Specifies whether the text is boldface.
Default: not checked

data.name: lblToolTipBorder.Help
data.value:
Specifies that a frame will be displayed around the tooltip.
Default: not checked Hint: Showing the contours can also be helpful for positioning the tooltip!

data.name: lblToolTipBorderColor.Help
data.value:
Specifies the border color of the tooltip.
default: -

data.name: lblToolTipFont.Help
data.value:
Spezifies the font name of the text.
Default: Verdana

data.name: lblToolTipFontColor.Help
data.value:
Spezifies the color of the text.
Default: #222222

data.name: lblToolTipFontSize.Help
data.value:
Spezifies the size of the text.
Default: 11

data.name: lblToolTipHeight.Help
data.value:
Specifies the height of the tooltip.
Default: 30

data.name: lblToolTipHTML.Help
data.value:
Specifies that the tooltip supports a subset of standard HTML tags.
Default: not checked

Important! If this option is checked the settings for Align, Bold, Italic, Font, Font Color, Font Size, Leading and Underline are ignored.

The following HTML tags are supported:
Anchor: <a ...>
Bold: <b>
Font: <font ...>
Italic: <i>
Paragraph: <p ...>
Underline: <u>
Break: <br>
Image: <img ...>
List Item: <li>

data.name: lblToolTipItalic.Help
data.value:
Specifies whether the text is italicized.
Default: not checked

data.name: lblToolTipLeading.Help
data.value:
Specifies the space in pixels between lines.
Default: 0

data.name: lblToolTipLeft.Help
data.value:
Specifies the margin between the tooltip and the left border of the animations window.
Default: 0

data.name: lblToolTipTop.Help
data.value:
Specifies the margin between the tooltip and the upper border of the animations window.
Default: 60

data.name: lblToolTipTopMost.Help
data.value:
Specifies that the tooltip is shown on top of other elements.
Default: checked

data.name: lblToolTipUnderline.Help
data.value:
Specifies whether the text is underlined.
Default: not checked

data.name: lblToolTipWidth.Help
data.value:
Specifies the width of the tooltip.
Default: 120

data.name: lblToolTipAlpha.Help
data.value:
Specifies the alpha transparency value of the tooltip.
Default: 100

data.name: lblContent3.Help
data.value:
Specifies the text to be shown in the first static text field.

Note: If you have checked option "HTML" you can make use of the following HTML tags for designing your text: Anchor: <a ...>
Bold: <b>
Font: <font ...>
Italic: <i>
Paragraph: <p ...>
Underline: <u>
Break: <br>
Image: <img ...>
List Item: <li>

data.name: lblContent4.Help
data.value:
Specifies the text to be shown in the second static text field.

Note: If you have checked option "HTML" you can make use of the following HTML tags for designing your text: Anchor: <a ...>
Bold: <b>
Font: <font ...>
Italic: <i>
Paragraph: <p ...>
Underline: <u>
Break: <br>
Image: <img ...>
List Item: <li>

data.name: lblContentAlignDynamic.Help
data.value:
Specifies the horizontal alignment of the text.
Default: left

data.name: lblContentAlignStatic.Help
data.value:
Specifies the horizontal alignment of the text.
Default: left

data.name: lblContentAlphaDynamic.Help
data.value:
Specifies the alpha transparency value of the text field.
Default: 100

data.name: lblContentAlphaStatic.Help
data.value:
Specifies the alpha transparency value of the text field.
Default: 100

data.name: lblContentAntiAliasingDynamic.Help
data.value:
Specifies that the font faces should be rendered more legible
Default: not checked

The setting enables high quality rendering and should be used by preference when using small fonts. (< 10 px)

HTML: When selecting anti-aliasing, the standard font (Verdana) will be used automatically! Please don’t define any fonts in HTML! If you do, the text will not be displayed!

<font color='#ffffff' face='Arial'>Text</font> invalid!
<font color='#ffffff'>Text</font> vaild!

data.name: lblContentAntiAliasingStatic.Help
data.value:
Specifies that the font faces should be rendered more legible
Default: not checked

The setting enables high quality rendering and should be used by preference when using small fonts. (< 10 px)

HTML: When selecting anti-aliasing, the standard font (Verdana) will be used automatically! Please don’t define any fonts in HTML! If you do, the text will not be displayed!

<font color='#ffffff' face='Arial'>Text</font> invalid!
<font color='#ffffff'>Text</font> vaild!

data.name: lblContentBgColorDynamic.Help
data.value:
Specifies the background color of the textfield.
Default: -

data.name: lblContentBgColorStatic.Help
data.value:
Specifies the background color of the textfield.
Default: -

data.name: lblContentBoldDynamic.Help
data.value:
Specifies whether the text is boldface.
Default: not checked

data.name: lblContentBoldStatic.Help
data.value:
Specifies whether the text is boldface.
Default: not checked

data.name: lblContentBorderDynamic.Help
data.value:
Specifies that a frame will be displayed around the text field.
Default: not checked Hint: Showing the contours can also be helpful for positioning the text field!

data.name: lblContentBorderStatic.Help
data.value:
Specifies that a frame will be displayed around the text field.
Default: not checked Hint: Showing the contours can also be helpful for positioning the text field!

data.name: lblContentFontColorDynamic.Help
data.value:
Spezifies the color of the text.
Default: #222222

data.name: lblContentFontColorStatic.Help
data.value:
Spezifies the color of the text.
Default: #222222

data.name: lblContentFontDynamic.Help
data.value:
Spezifies the font name of the text.
Default: Verdana

data.name: lblContentFontSizeDynamic.Help
data.value:
Spezifies the size of the text.
Default: 12

data.name: lblContentFontSizeStatic.Help
data.value:
Spezifies the size of the text.
Default: 12

data.name: lblContentFontStatic.Help
data.value:
Spezifies the font name of the text.
Default: Verdana

data.name: lblContentHeightDynamic.Help
data.value:
Specifies the height of the textbox.
Default: 60 | 60

data.name: lblContentHeightStatic.Help
data.value:
Specifies the height of the textbox.
Default: 60 | 60

data.name: lblContentHTMLDynamic.Help
data.value:
Specifies that the textfield supports a subset of standard HTML tags.
Default: not checked

Important! If this option is checked the settings for Align, Bold, Italic, Font, Font Color, Font Size, Leading and Underline are ignored.

The following HTML tags are supported:
Anchor: <a ...>
Bold: <b>
Font: <font ...>
Italic: <i>
Paragraph: <p ...>
Underline: <u>
Break: <br>
Image: <img ...>
List Item: <li>

data.name: lblContentHTMLStatic.Help
data.value:
Specifies that the textfield supports a subset of standard HTML tags.
Default: not checked

Important! If this option is checked the settings for Align, Bold, Italic, Font, Font Color, Font Size, Leading and Underline are ignored.

The following HTML tags are supported:
Anchor: <a ...>
Bold: <b>
Font: <font ...>
Italic: <i>
Paragraph: <p ...>
Underline: <u>
Break: <br>
Image: <img ...>
List Item: <li>

data.name: lblContentItalicDynamic.Help
data.value:
Specifies whether the text is italicized.
Default: not checked

data.name: lblContentItalicStatic.Help
data.value:
Specifies whether the text is italicized.
Default: not checked

data.name: lblContentLeadingDynamic.Help
data.value:
Specifies the space in pixels between lines.
Default: 0

data.name: lblContentLeadingStatic.Help
data.value:
Specifies the space in pixels between lines.
Default: 0

data.name: lblContentLeftDynamic.Help
data.value:
Specifies the margin between the textbox and the left border of the animations window.
Default: 0 | 130

data.name: lblContentLeftStatic.Help
data.value:
Specifies the margin between the textbox and the left border of the animations window.
Default: 260 | 390

data.name: lblContentSelectableDynamic.Help
data.value:
Specifies whether the text field is selectable.
Default: not checked

If selectable is checked, the text in the text field can be selected with the mouse or keyboard, and the text can be copied with the Copy command (CTRL +C).

data.name: lblContentSelectableStatic.Help
data.value:
Specifies whether the text field is selectable.
Default: not checked

If selectable is checked, the text in the text field can be selected with the mouse or keyboard, and the text can be copied with the Copy command (CTRL +C).

data.name: lblContentTopDynamic.Help
data.value:
Specifies the margin between the textbox and the upper border of the animations window.
Default: 10 | 10

data.name: lblContentTopMostDynamic.Help
data.value:
Specifies that the text field is shown on top of other elements.
Default: checked

data.name: lblContentTopMostStatic.Help
data.value:
Specifies that the text field is shown on top of other elements.
Default: checked

data.name: lblContentTopStatic.Help
data.value:
Specifies the margin between the textbox and the upper border of the animations window.
Default: 10 | 10

data.name: lblContentUnderlineDynamic.Help
data.value:
Specifies whether the text is underlined.
Default: not checked

data.name: lblContentUnderlineStatic.Help
data.value:
Specifies whether the text is underlined.
Default: not checked

data.name: lblContentVisibleOnDetailPage.Help
data.value:
Specifies that the static text field should be displayed on the Detail page.
Default: checked

data.name: lblContentVisibleOnAnimationPage.Help
data.value:
Specifies that the static text field should be displayed on the Carousel page.
Default: checked

data.name: lblContentWidthDynamic.Help
data.value:
Specifies the width of the textbox.
Default: 120 | 120

data.name: lblContentWidthStatic.Help
data.value:
Specifies the width of the textbox.
Default: 120 | 120

data.name: lblDetailImageLeft.Help
data.value:
Specifies the margin between the image and the left border of the animation window.
Default: 60

data.name: lblDetailImageTop.Help
data.value:
Specifies the margin between the image and the upper border of the animation window.
Default: 170

data.name: lblDetailPageEnabled.Help
data.value:
Specifies whether the details page should be displayed.
Default: checked

data.name: lblLightboxCenter.Help
data.value:
Specifies the Lightbox to be shown centered in the middle of the browser window.
Default: checked
If this option is checked the settings for Position Left and Position Top are ignored.

data.name: lblLightboxHeight.Help
data.value:
Specifies the height of the Lightbox.
Default: 250

data.name: lblLightboxEffectExit.Help
data.value: Specifies the effect to be applied on the disappearance of the Lightbox. Default: "BlindUp"

data.name: lblLightboxLeft.Help
data.value:
Specifies the margin between the Lightbox and the left border of the browser window.
Default: 0

data.name: lblLightboxResizable.Help
data.value:
Specifies whether the dimensions of the Lightbox can be modified by the user with the mouse.
Default: not checked

data.name: lblLightboxEffectEntry.Help
data.value: Specifies the effect to be applied on the appearance of the Lightbox. Default: "BlindDown"

data.name: lblLightboxTop.Help
data.value:
Specifies the margin between the Lightbox and the upper border of the browser window.
Default: 0

data.name: lblLightboxWidth.Help
data.value:
Specifies the width of the Lightbox.
Default: 350

data.name: lblLightboxAlpha.Help
data.value:
Specifies the alpha transparency value of the Lightbox.
Default: 100

data.name: lblLightboxContent.Help
data.value:
Specifies the content to be displayed in the Lightbox.
Default: "Carousel Image"

data.name: lblLightboxEffectsTime.Help
data.value:
Specifies how long the effect will take (in seconds).
Default: 0.5

data.name: lblLightboxTheme.Help
data.value:
Specifies the theme (style, layout) to be applied by the Lightbox.
Default: AlphaCube
Altogether 10 different themes are available. These are contained in directory /DesktopModules/3DCarousel/Lightbox/Themes and can be modified at any time.

data.name: lblLightboxTitle.Help
data.value:
Specifies the title to be displayed in der Lightbox.
Default: None

data.name: lblToolTipHideContent3.Help
data.value: Specifies that the first static text field is masked out when displaying the Tooltip. Default: not checked

data.name: lblToolTipHideContent4.Help
data.value: Specifies that the second static text field is masked out when displaying the Tooltip. Default: not checked

data.name: lblImageClickAction.Help
data.value:
Specifies the action to be executed when an image in the 3D Carousel is clicked on.
Open Link: opens a link to another web page.
Show DetailPage: displays the DetailPage.
Show Lightbox: displays a Lightbox.

data.name: lblCarouselCenterLeft.Help
data.value:
Specifies the position of the Carousel starting from the center of the animation window.
Default: 0
Plus and minus values are accepted. e.g -20

The standard position of the Carousel is in the center of the animation window. With this setting the Carousel can be shifted horizontally.

data.name: lblCarouselCenterTop.Help
data.value:
Specifies the position of the Carousel starting from the center of the animation window.
Default: 0
Plus and minus values are accepted. e.g -20

The standard position of the Carousel is in the center of the animation window. With this setting the Carousel can be shifted vertically.

data.name: lblCarouselInitialRotation.Help
data.value:
Specifies how long the Carousel should rotate initially. Works only in combination with the navigation buttons.
Default: 0

data.name: lblCarouselPerspective.Help
data.value:
Specifies the spatial extension of the Carousel.
Default: 10

Experiment with the settings "Radius-X", "Radius-Y" and "Perspective" to obtain the desired configuration of your Carousel.

data.name: lblCarouselPreloader.Help
data.value:
Specifies a path to a Flash file (swf) or image file (jpg, png, gif) to display as a preloader message.
Default: preloader.swf

A preloader is an indicator to inform the viewer that content is being loaded, e.g. "Please wait…" A default preloader (preloader.swf) has been provided and is preset for this option.

data.name: lblCarouselRadiusX.Help
data.value:
Specifies the width of the X axis of the Carousel.
Default: 150

Experiment with the settings Radius-X, Radius-Y and Perspective to obtain the desired configuration of your Carousel.

data.name: lblCarouselRadiusY.Help
data.value:
Specifies the length of the Y axis of the Carousel.
Default: 30

Experiment with the settings "Radius-X", "Radius-Y" and "Perspective" to obtain the desired configuration of your Carousel.

data.name: lblCarouselRandomImages.Help
data.value:
Specifies the number of images shown randomly at any time. Images are taken randomly from the complete selection contained in the Carousel.
Default: -

data.name: lblCarouselSpeed.Help
data.value:
Specifies the speed of rotation of the Carousel.
Default: 15

data.name: lblCarouselSpeedMax.Help
data.value: Specifies the maximum rotation speed which the Carousel may reach when controlled via mouse (Navigation "auto"). Default: -

data.name: lblFrameBorderAlpha.Help
data.value:
Specifies the alpha transparency value of the image frame border.
Default: 50

data.name: lblFrameBorderColor.Help
data.value:
Specifies the color of the image frame border.
Default: -

data.name: lblFrameBorderWidth.Help
data.value:
Specifies the width of the image frame border.
Default: 3

data.name: lblFrameDistance.Help
data.value:
Specifies the distance between frame and image.
Default: 10

data.name: lblFrameFillAlpha1.Help
data.value:
Specifies the alpha transparency value of the first fill color.
Default: 50

data.name: lblFrameFillAlpha2.Help
data.value:
Specifies the alpha transparency value of the second fill color.
Default: 50

data.name: lblFrameFillColor1.Help
data.value:
Specifies the color with which an image frame should be filled.
Default: -

data.name: lblFrameFillColor2.Help
data.value:
Specifies a second color with which the image frame should be filled.
Default: -

Do not enter any information if you want to use only one fill color!

data.name: lblFrameFillRotation.Help
data.value:
Specifies the rotation of the fill in radians.
Default: 0

data.name: lblFrameFillTransition.Help
data.value:
Specifies in percent the width of the transition from first to second fill color.
Default: 100

data.name: lblFrameVisible.Help
data.value:
Specifies whether each Carousel image should have an image frame.
Default: not checked

data.name: lblToolTipDefaultTop.Help
data.value:
Specifies the position of the tooltip starting from the tooltips default position.
Default: 0
Plus and minus values are accepted. e.g -150

The default position of the Tooltip is above the image. With this setting the Tooltip can be shifted vertically.

data.name: lblToolTipVisible.Help
data.value:
Specifies whether tooltips should be displayed above the Carousel images.
Default: checked
